title: 119 Medieval Characters - semi-realistic comic style w/ transparent backgrounds
description: 119 versatile 2D Fantasy Medieval Characters in semi-realistic cartoon style with transparent backgrounds, available in 1024x1024, 512x512, 256x256 and 128x128 resolutions. PNG Format Included.
longDescription:
Meet the medieval society with '119 Fantasy Medieval Characters' – a diverse tapestry that brings the Middle Ages to life in your next gaming venture. From the humble townsfolk to the noble knights, and not forgetting the mystical beings lurking in the shadows, this asset pack offers a full spectrum of characters to populate your world.


Each character is meticulously designed in a charming 2D style, perfect for developers crafting games with a medieval fantasy theme. Whether you're developing a role-playing game, a strategy game, or looking to enrich your game's UI with distinctive avatars, these characters are ready to animate your project.


Enliven your mobile games, educational apps, or interactive storybooks with a touch of whimsy and historical allure. The '119 Fantasy Medieval Characters' pack not only provides a range of figures suitable for any plot or scene but also adds depth and authenticity to your creative work.
technicalDetails:
Features:


  • Broad Variety: 119 versatile 2D Fantasy Medieval Characters covering a comprehensive range of designs.
  • Unique Visual Appeal: Semi-realistic cartoon style that stands out on any platform.
  • Mobile-Friendly: Optimized for performance on mobile devices with multiple resolutions tailored for various screen sizes and quick load times.
  • Versatile Use: Perfectly suited for a variety of games and applications, from mobile and desktop to web-based projects.
  • Multiple Resolutions: Assets are sharp and clear at all sizes, with versions available in 1024x1024, 512x512, 256x256, and 128x128 pixels, ensuring crisp visuals on both high and low-end devices.
  • Transparent Backgrounds: Ready-to-use assets with transparent backgrounds for seamless integration into any scene or interface.
  • Consistent Design: A uniform style ensures a cohesive visual experience across your game or app.
  • PNG Format included: High-quality, lossless PNG files ensure flawless visuals while being easily adaptable for different platforms and engine versions.
  • Broad Compatibility: Tested and confirmed for use in all major graphic applications and platforms, including mobile development.


Number of Unique Textures: 119 (each available in four resolutions)

Texture Resolutions: 1024x1024, 512x512, 256x256, and 128x128

Animated: No


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
